desc.en: Sensei discovers Kasumi's hideout. It turns out that Kasumi is planning her next demolition. Sensei encourages Kasumi to choose a place with as few people as possible, and she fortunately decides on an empty mountain valley.
desc.jp: Sensei discovers Kasumi's hideout. It turns out that Kasumi is planning her next demolition. Sensei encourages Kasumi to choose a place with as few people as possible, and she fortunately decides on an empty mountain valley.
desc.zh_cn: 老师来佳澄的基地找佳澄。佳澄正在制定接下来的爆破计划。老师尽可能引导佳澄在人少的地方运行计划，幸好佳澄把下一个目标定在空无一人的山谷。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei visits a construction site after receiving a call from Kasumi. Kasumi says that she enjoys the act of demolition regardless of whether it's successful or not. She mentions that she has her eye on the Schale building, so she wants Sensei to weigh in on the selection of the next hot springs spot. The two stay up all night thinking about it.
desc.jp: Sensei visits a construction site after receiving a call from Kasumi. Kasumi says that she enjoys the act of demolition regardless of whether it's successful or not. She mentions that she has her eye on the Schale building, so she wants Sensei to weigh in on the selection of the next hot springs spot. The two stay up all night thinking about it.
desc.zh_cn: 因为收到佳澄的联系，老师来到了工地。他说与成功与否无关，自己只是纯粹喜欢爆破工作而已。他还说自己看上了{et夏莱}的建筑物，建议老师帮忙选择温泉的爆破地点时要认真一点。就这样两人想下一个地点想了一整晚。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei invites Kasumi to Schale. Kasumi brings various books on civil engineering, geology, and architectural engineering and begins to study. Sensei tells her that she can visit anytime she wants, and they spend some time chatting.
desc.jp: Sensei invites Kasumi to Schale. Kasumi brings various books on civil engineering, geology, and architectural engineering and begins to study. Sensei tells her that she can visit anytime she wants, and they spend some time chatting.
desc.zh_cn: 老师请佳澄到{et夏莱}一趟。佳澄带来了各种与土木、地质学、建筑工学有关的书籍，开始钻研。老师告诉佳澄，只要想来的话随时欢迎，两人一边闲聊一边打发时间。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Kasumi calls Sensei to the mountains for help. She had slipped and tore her slippers while scouting a location. Sensei assures her that she'll be fine and carries Kasumi down the mountain... She then asks for new slippers.
desc.jp: Kasumi calls Sensei to the mountains for help. She had slipped and tore her slippers while scouting a location. Sensei assures her that she'll be fine and carries Kasumi down the mountain... She then asks for new slippers.
desc.zh_cn: 老师收到佳澄发来的救援请求，于是来到山中。佳澄在寻找爆破点的过程中不小心滑倒，拖鞋坏掉了。虽然佳澄说自己没事，请老师把拖鞋拿给自己，但老师还是背着佳澄下山。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

profile.en:
ゲヘナ学園所属、温泉開発部の部長。

源泉が流れる土地は全て温泉にしなければならないと主張し、一度決めたらどこであろうと手段を選ばず爆破してしまう。部員からは全面的な支持を得ているが、実際の言動や行動は指名手配中の犯罪者である。
profile.jp:
ゲヘナ学園所属、温泉開発部の部長。

源泉が流れる土地は全て温泉にしなければならないと主張し、一度決めたらどこであろうと手段を選ばず爆破してしまう。部員からは全面的な支持を得ているが、実際の言動や行動は指名手配中の犯罪者である。
profile.zh_cn_jp:
格黑娜学园所属，「温泉开发部」的部长。

主张有泉眼的土地必须全部开发成温泉，一旦下定决心的话无论在哪都会不择手段地进行爆破。
尽管赢来了部员们的全面支持，实际上的言行、行为和通缉犯没两样。

ゲヘナ学园所属、温泉开発部の部长。

源泉が流れる土地は全て温泉にしなければならないと主张し、一度决めたらどこであろうと手段を选ばず爆破してしまう。部员からは全面的な支持を得ているが、実际の言动や行动は指名手配中の犯罪者である。

intro.en: Wahaha! Wherever there's a hot spring, so are we! And wherever there's no hot spring, we're there too! The explosives are primed for detonation!
intro.jp:
ハーッハッハッハッ！そこに温泉があるから我々がいる！
いや、たとえ温泉がなくとも我々がいる！
さあ、発破の準備はできているぞ！
intro.zh_cn_jp:
ハーッハッハッハッ！そこに温泉があるから我々がいる！
いや、たとえ温泉がなくとも我々がいる！
さあ、発破の準備はできているぞ！
intro.zh_cn_tw:
哈～哈哈哈！哪里有温泉我们就在哪！
不，就算没有温泉我们也在！
来，爆破准备已经就绪啰！

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

为了打开新的事业「海之家」，百夜堂一行人来到了渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是渡假胜地之间的权利争夺「Resort・Battle Royal」。

desc.zh_cn: 等待着前往和头盔团进行最后之战的一行人是，过去将{sn阿拜多斯}逼近绝境的凯萨理事本人。目前负责章鱼银行营业职员的凯萨理事，即使向{cf静子}提案了新投资也被拒绝。就这样向着{cf静子}袭来的头盔团以及新人的泳装蒙面团……！{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn阿拜多斯}漫长的夏天，最后之战即刻开始！

desc.en: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.jp: Trinity's relic—a relic that could make or break the Tea Party's political fortunes—is on a train headed to Gehenna! Ichika boards the train to retrieve the relic, where she encounters Gehenna's most wanted criminal...!
desc.zh_cn:
在将文物移送至{sn三一}的途中，{cf一花}和老师发现委托载运的列车正开往{sn其他}目的地。

desc.en: 一花看到破碎的文物後總算冷靜下來，老師表示會和他一起去道歉。在笑著說一花的努力都看在眼裡後，一花的表情也明朗了起來。就在此時，列車被放置在行進方向上的爆裂物掀翻。
desc.jp: 一花看到破碎的文物後總算冷靜下來，老師表示會和他一起去道歉。在笑著說一花的努力都看在眼裡後，一花的表情也明朗了起來。就在此時，列車被放置在行進方向上的爆裂物掀翻。

desc.en: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.jp: The 100th track in Blue Archive, used during the battle with Hod. "Undefined Behaviour" is a programming term, used to describe the result of executing a program whose behavior is prescribed to be unpredictable, in the language specification to which the computer code adheres.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第86首曲子，其在与“霍德”(Hod)战斗时使用。在编程中，“未定义行为”是指执行某种计算机代码所产生的结果，这种代码在当前程序状态下的行为在其所使用的语言标准中没有规定。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
